name: Missing Ball
description:
It's midnight. Little Charlie lost his favorite ball when playing at daytime, so he decided to go to the [REDACTED] Forest. But this forest is not normal and Charlie will regret walking alone at night trying to find his missing ball...

Missing Ball  is a short horror visual novel based on analog horror and their bizarre images. It can be played in Windows, Linux and Mac, since it was made using Ren'Py.

Programming, Sound Effects, Music, Art and Everything Else - Two person work

Thanks for stepping in here and enjoy the game!
